Dominion [startdom]: 2

The Wyrm is an enormous serpent with one head at each end of its huge body. The physical might of the Wyrm is awesome and even Dragons avoid battles with the great serpent. The bite of the Wyrm is poisonous and the beast regenerates from wounds during battle.
